#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int mat[2500];

#define gc getchar_unlocked
 
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}

void preprocess()
{
	int temp[5000],i,j,tt;
	int len=0;
	int sum,carry;
	mat[0]=1; mat[1]=2;
	temp[0]=2;
	for(i=2;i<=2500;i++)
	{
		mat[i]=0;
		carry=0;
		for(j=0;j<=len;j++)
		{
			tt = temp[j]*2;
			temp[j] = tt%10 + carry;
			carry = tt/10;
			if(carry!=0 && j==len)
			{	
				temp[j+1] = carry; 
				len++; 
				break;
			}
		}
		for(j=0;j<=len;j++)
			mat[i]+=temp[j];
	}
}

int main()
{
	int t,n;
	preprocess();
	scanint(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanint(n);
		printf("%d\n",mat[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
